about.title: About Coach Mario
about.p1: Mario Fernandez, a former professional pitcher in the Tampa Bay Rays organization, brings years of professional and international experience to every training session.
about.p2: Whether you’re refining your delivery, building velocity, or learning how to compete with confidence, Mario’s approach develops complete pitchers — from the mind to the mound.

programs.title: Training Programs
programs.intro: Every athlete’s journey is unique. Mario’s programs are built to refine mechanics, elevate velocity, and develop the competitive mindset it takes to dominate from the mound.

private.title: Private Lessons
private.desc: One-on-one sessions focused on mechanical precision, sequencing, and personalized feedback.

velocity.title: Velocity & Strength
velocity.desc: A hybrid of movement science and explosive training. Build safe arm speed, improve posture, and unlock power on every pitch.

group.title: Group Sessions
group.desc: Train alongside peers in competitive environments that sharpen focus, command, and execution under pressure.
